mapper.select: select `name` as area from erui_operation.market_area where lang = 'zh' and deleted_flag = 'N'

SELECT t3.`name` AS country FROM erui_operation.market_area t1, erui_operation.market_area_country t2, erui_dict.country t3 WHERE t1.`name` = #{area} AND t1.bn = t2.market_area_bn AND t2.country_bn = t3.bn AND t1.lang = 'zh' AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t3.lang = 'zh' AND t3.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t2.`status` = 'VALID'

SELECT t1.name AS area_name, t1.bn AS area_bn, t3.name AS country_name, t3.bn AS country_bn FROM erui_operation.market_area t1, erui_operation.market_area_country t2, erui_dict.country t3 WHERE (t1.bn = t2.market_area_bn AND t1.lang = 'zh' AND t2.country_bn = t3.bn AND t3.lang = 'zh' AND t3.bn = #{countryBn})
